content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Extraction System at Position(-3.5, 27.5)
Consists of:
– A burner inserter serving as the extraction system, located at (–3.5, 27.5) with its drop position at (–3.5, 28.5).

### Copper Cable Factory Interface at Approximately (2.5, 17.5)
Consists of:
– A cable factory input chest positioned at (2.5, 17.5).
– A dedicated factory burner inserter placed at (3.5, 17.5) at the interface.
– A coal‐fed burner inserter located at (1.5, 17.5) that helps supply the production process.
– An assembling machine (assembling-machine-1) positioned at (1.5, 19.5) for copper-cable production.

### Belt Depot at Position(3.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
– A wooden chest placed at (3.5, 15.5) serving as the belt depot.
– An adjacent transport belt segment located at (4.5, 15.5).
– A dedicated depot burner inserter positioned at (3.5, 14.5) (using direction UP) adjoining the depot chest.

### Electricity Generator at Position(–0.5, 24.5)
Consists of:
– A steam engine (generator) located at (–0.5, 24.5).
– A boiler positioned at (–5.5, 24.0).
– An offshore pump situated at (–7.5, 25.5).

### Smelting Facility at Position(–3.0, 19.0)
Consists of:
– A stone furnace at (–3.0, 19.0) producing iron plates.
– A stone furnace at (–4.0, 21.0) producing copper plates.
– A wooden chest at (–5.5, 21.5) acting as storage for smelted outputs.

### Research Lab (ID: 7106)
Consists of:
– A lab configured with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 17}. (Position not specified)

ERROR TIPS
────────────
– Belt Connection Errors:
  • Transport belts were repeatedly attempted to be connected directly to a steam engine target. Always route belts to an appropriate inserter that feeds items into the steam engine rather than targeting the engine itself.

– Entity Placement Distance Errors:
  • Attempts to place a wooden chest failed because the player was too far from the target position. Move closer to the desired placement location (within the maximum distance allowed) before placing an entity.

– Inventory Shortage Errors:
  • Failures occurred when trying to place a wooden chest without it being present in the inventory. Confirm that the required entity is available in inventory prior to placement.

– Variable Naming Issues:
  • A NameError was raised due to using an undefined variable (‘target_chest’). Ensure variable names are correctly defined and consistently referenced (for example, using existing identifiers like target_pos, target_place_pos, or depot_chest).
